title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist, vat dyed in indigo on plain weave. Every third weft is twice as thick as the other wefts giving the fabric a ribbed appearance.
dimensions: Warp: 35.5cm (14 in.). Weft: (selvage on left), 50 cm (19 1/2 in.)
description: Corner of a table cover. Border design of tassels alternate with flowers, field of intersecting circles.
